body.name: Small Sling Bag for Women Men, Nylon Cross Body Bag with Adjustable Strap, Lightweight Chest Bag for Travel Hiking
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Versatile Use: With adjustable straps, our crossbody sling bag can be worn over the shoulder, across the chest, or on the back. Wear it as a cross body purse, sling bag, chest bag, fanny pack or shoulder bag with adjustable straps and D-rings for a perfect fit.

Adjustable Design: With dimensions of 5.5"(L) x 1.5"(W) x8"(H),0.35LB.Adjustable strap: 30” to 52” — Includes the buckle and waist packs; the sling bag offers ample space for your phone, sunglasses, wallet, keys, and passport. Perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle!

High Quality：Crafted with high-density nylon, these fanny pack cross body bags are more abrasion-resistant than canvas or polyester, ensuring durability for everyday use. Say goodbye to bulky handbags and embrace the hands-free convenience of our chic sling bag.

Large Capacity：Multiple pockets including a front zipper pocket, 2 main zipper pocket with insert pocket for easy access to your essentials, you'll have easy access to your belongings. It's truly a must-have crossbody bag for women trendy!Ideal for daily use, running, hiking, cycling, camping, gym workouts, music festivals, and more.

After-Sale Service: CLUCI committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service and top quality goods, if you are not satisfied with the leather sling bag for women or service for any reason, please feel free to contact us by email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but surprisingly roomy
reviews.reviewText: Got this so I don't have to lug a big purse around for short outings. I really like it. It fits everything that I need with some room to spare. It's very light weight and can be worn several different ways. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars comes like the picture, nothing special, but works
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the CLUCI Small Sling Bag as a convenient option for carrying essentials when I'm out and about. The bag looked just as it did in the picture when it arrived, which was reassuring.It's a straightforward, no-frills bag – nothing particularly special about its design, but it serves its purpose well. The nylon material makes it lightweight, which is a big plus for me as I prefer not to carry heavy bags. The adjustable strap provided a comfortable fit, whether I wore it over one shoulder or as a crossbody bag.One of the aspects I appreciate about this sling bag is its practicality. It's spacious enough to hold my phone, wallet, keys, and a few other small items, making it an ideal choice for quick errands or casual outings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically for vacation so I wouldn’t lose my purse. I put a couple things in it (nothing heavy) headed to the airport and where it clips into the material at the bottom it frayed off. Didn’t last 3 hrs. I clipped it to the other side and it broke within a day. The quality is horrible do not purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and lovely!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 19 years old and she wears this cross bag a lot. It is of good quality and easy to clean. It holds fair amount of essentials and yet not look bulky. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hiking
reviews.reviewText: I've taken this on a few hikes and it's great. Light weight, adjustable, and pretty discreet in the all black color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for a teen
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this CLUCI Small Sling Bag for my daughter as a gift. I ordered the green color, which is her favorite. The actual color is very similar to the pictures, which I am happy about. The size is perfect for her to hold a wallet, her phone and several snack items.The zippers on the bag are nice and slide well. The stitching is strong and there are no loose threads. The clasps work well and the strap slides easily to adjust the length. It feels like a nice quality product. I am happy with this bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cluck cross bag
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have had this bag for a month uses it maybe two times if that. I love the bag but I’m not happy that this happened. I bought 4 other bags and I have to say I love them, hopefully I’ll hear back from the seller.Aida

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for me - love the olive green
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a cross-body bag for my wife and I to use while at Disneyland. Seems like a lot of people are using these nowadays. I wanted a color/design that both of us would be comfortable wearing. I like the location of the straps as a true cross-body bag and not a repurposed fanny pack.I also thought this bag was the perfect size. I've seen some really small ones that fig just a phone and maybe some cards/cash, or really big ones but this one is a really nice size. It fits the phone but can also fit snacks, etc... without being too big.
